article:
The Creightons were very proud of their son, Frank. After his graduation from university, Frank was drafted into the army and soon after that, he received his call to go to the   _  .
    At first the parents heard from him every week and were   _  for
his well-being but then a telegram came saying, "We regret to inform you that your son has been   _  for three weeks and may
have been killed in  _  ."The parents were shocked
and grieved  . They felt very   _  without Frank. About three
weeks later,  _  , the phone rang. A voice on the other  _  said, "Mother,it's Frank. They   _  me, and I'm going to be all right. I'm in the United States and I'm coming home soon. "
    Mrs. Creighton was overjoyed,   _  tears running
down her cheeks,"Oh,that's just wonderful, Frank!"
    There was   silence  for a moment, and then Frank said, "Mother,
I want to ask you something important to me. While I've been in the  _  , I've made some real  _  friends. There is
one fellow I would like to bring home to meet you and Dad. And I would like to
know if it would be all right if he could stay with us. He has  _  else to go."
    His mother assured him it would be all right.
    Then Frank said, "You see, he was   _  in battle.
His face is all disfigured. He lost his  _  , and his
right hand is missing. So you see,he feels   _  about how
others will  _  him."
    Frank's mother stopped to think a minute. Then she said, "Sure Frank, you bring him home--for a    _  ,that's it. About him
staying with us permanently , well, we'll have to think about that." Frank said, "Okay, Mother," and hung up.
    A week went by without any   _  from Frank,and then a telegram arrived, "We regret to inform you that your son has   _  his
life. We would like you to come and identify the body."
     "Why had he done this?" When they walked into the room to identify the body of their son, they found a young man with a disfigured face, one leg missing, and his right hand gone.
